Hi Waheed,

 

For CGA :

 

Point #3 - Insurance claim (GL Code: 463120) – Why this balance is not cleared yet

 

I had a meeting with @Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  regarding insurances and these are the points noted:

 

1.	Not all insurance claims are related to MOD hence there is a remaining balance.
2.	Allocation of balances to CGA Ralph Lauren, ALG, and RTC are still under discussion regarding the validation of all payments made/received between the insurance company and past outstanding balances.
3.	Remaining can also come from excess accruals.

 

KR,

 

Nikki

 

NICOLEKAYE HILARIO​​​​

ASSOCIATE SENIOR ACCOUNTANT ‑ REPORTING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
